snippet.title: BATSUMARU - Release Trailer - 2022
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1786780/Batsumaru/
(playable demo available)

Release Data: 03/15/2022

BATSUMARU is a short and minimalist puzzle game. Inspired by logical board games such as Go and Othello, this game will require you to think ahead as you change X's into O's in about 70 puzzles using various game mechanics.
